Fixed a Fend bug that would abort the Fend prematurely on the server.
把一将比预期时间早地放弃自给的努力的自给的努力臭虫固定在服务器上.
Garlic is known to fend off colds.
大家都知道大蒜可以预防感冒.
They tried to fend off the questions raised by the newsman.
他们试图回避新闻记者的问题.
To get the new job, you may have to fend off competitors, so be ready.
为了获得这份新的工作, 也意味着你需要打败对手.
Many companies are hunting for drugs to fend off this sort of memory loss.
许多公司正搜寻这种抵挡记忆丧失的药物.
